format_prompts.ocr_like: Generate text that looks like it was scanned from a PDF with slight OCR errors: occasional character misreads (like '0' instead of 'O', 'rn' instead of 'm'), inconsistent spacing, some formatting artifacts. Keep it readable but imperfect.
format_prompts.high_density: Generate text with extremely high technical term density: use many domain-specific abbreviations, jargon, and technical terminology. Pack as much specialized vocabulary as possible while maintaining coherence.
format_prompts.simple: Generate text in plain, accessible language. Use simple sentence structures, avoid complex jargon, and explain concepts in an easy-to-understand way. Target audience: beginners.
format_prompts.academic: Generate text in formal academic writing style: complex sentence structures, citations, technical precision, formal tone. Similar to excerpts from research papers or academic textbooks.
